explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a supervised learning-based prediction technique for lean blowout prediction in gas turbines, which falls under the umbrella of machine learning.
explanations.supervised learning: The study explicitly mentions using supervised learning for the prediction task, as it involves training a model on labeled data.
explanations.classification: The task of predicting lean blowout (LBO) is a classification problem, where the model classifies whether an LBO event will occur or not.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper uses Linear Support Vector Machine (LSVM) as part of the proposed prediction approach.
explanations.SVM: SVM is an abbreviation for Support Vector Machine, which is used in the proposed method.
